2: Quantum gate tutorial1¶

[1]:

from renom_q import *
import math

2-1: Identity operator \(I\)¶

\[ I = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{array} \right]\]
\[ I\left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left| 0 \right\rangle\]
[2]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.id(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'0': 1024}

2-2: Bit inversion operator \(X\)¶

\[ X = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 0 \end{array} \right]\]
\[ X\left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 0 \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] = \left| 1 \right\rangle\]
\[ X\left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 0 \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] = \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left| 0 \right\rangle\]
[3]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-3: Phase inversion operator \(Z\)¶

\[ Z = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right]\]
\[Z \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[Z \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \end{array} \right] =-\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
[4]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.z(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-4: Phase and bit inversion operator \(Y\)¶

\[ Y = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & -i \\ i & 0 \end{array} \right]\]
\[ Y \left| 0 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & -i \\ i & 0 \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ i \end{array} \right] =i\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
\[ Y \left| 1 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 0 & -i \\ i & 0 \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} -i \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =-i\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
[5]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.y(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-5: \(4/\pi\) phase shift operator \(S\)¶

\[ S = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & i \end{array} \right]\]
\[ S\left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & i \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[ S\left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & i \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ i \end{array} \right] =i\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
[6]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.s(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-6: \(-4/\pi\) phase shift operator \(S^{\dagger}\)¶

\[ S^{\dagger} = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -i \end{array} \right]\]
\[ S^{\dagger} \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -i \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[ S^{\dagger} \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -i \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -i \end{array} \right] =-i\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
[7]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.sdg(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-7: \(8/\pi\) phase shift operator \(T\)¶

\[T=\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1+i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\]
\[T \left| 0 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1+i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[T \left| 1 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1+i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ (1+i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right] = \frac{(1+i)\left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[8]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.t(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-8: \(-8/\pi\) phase shift operator \(T^{\dagger}\)¶

\[T^{\dagger} =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1-i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\]
\[T^{\dagger} \left| 0 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1-i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] = \left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[T^{\dagger} \left| 1 \right\rangle =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & (1-i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right]=\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ (1-i)/\sqrt{2} \end{array} \right] = \frac{(1-i)\left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[9]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.tdg(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-9: Hadamard gate \(H\)¶

\[H= \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 1\\ 1 & -1 \end{array} \right]\]
\[H\left| 0 \right\rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 1\\ 1 & -1 \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1\\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1\\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
\[H\left| 1 \right\rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 1\\ 1 & -1 \end{array} \right]\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0\\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1\\ -1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle - \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[10]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.h(q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'0': 519, '1': 505}

Superposition of 2 qubit by Hadamard transformation¶

\[ \left| 0 \right\rangle \otimes \left| 0 \right\rangle \xrightarrow{H \otimes H} H\left| 0 \right\rangle \otimes H\left| 0 \right\rangle =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}} \otimes \frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}} =\frac{1}{2} \left[ \left| 00 \right\rangle + \left| 01 \right\rangle + \left| 10 \right\rangle + \left| 11 \right\rangle \right]\]
[11]:

q = QuantumRegister(2)
c = ClassicalRegister(2)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

for i in range(2):
    qc.h(q[i])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'00': 264, '01': 255, '10': 242, '11': 263}

2-10: \(x\)-axis rotation gate \(R_x\)¶

\[R_x(\theta) =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} & -i \sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} \\ -i \sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} & \cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\theta=\pi /2\)

\[ R_x(\pi /2) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} & -i \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\ -i \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} & \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \\ -i \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle -i \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
\[ R_x(\pi /2) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} & -i \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\ -i \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} & \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} -i \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \\ \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \end{array} \right] =\frac{-i \left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[12]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.rx(math.pi/2, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'0': 494, '1': 530}

2-11: \(y\)-axis rotation gate \(R_y\)¶

\[R_y(\theta) =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} & -\sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} \\ \sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} & \cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\theta=\pi /2\)

\[ R_y(\pi /2) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} & -\sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\ \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} & \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \\ \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
\[ R_y(\pi /2) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} & -\sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} \\ \sin{\frac{\pi}{4}} & \cos{\frac{\pi}{4}} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} - \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \\ \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \end{array} \right] =\frac{- \left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[13]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.ry(math.pi/2, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'0': 500, '1': 524}

2-12: \(z\)-axis rotation gate \(R_z\)¶

\[R_z(\theta) =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\theta} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\theta=\pi\)

\[ R_z(\pi) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\pi} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[ R_z(\pi) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\pi} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \end{array} \right] =-\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
[14]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.rz(math.pi, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-13: Unitary rotation gate \(U_1\)¶

\[U_1(\lambda) =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\lambda} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\lambda=\pi\)

\[ U_1(\pi) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\pi} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
\[ U_1(\pi) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & e^{i\pi} \end{array} \right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \end{array} \right] =-\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
[15]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.x(q[0])
qc.u1(math.pi, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}

2-14: Unitary rotation gate \(U_2\)¶

\[U_2(\phi, \lambda) =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & -e^{i\lambda} \\ e^{i\phi} & e^{i(\lambda + \phi)} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\phi=0,\ \ \lambda=\pi\)

\[ U_2(0, \pi) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & -e^{i\pi} \\ e^{i0} & e^{i(\pi + 0)} \end{array}\right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle + \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
\[ U_2(0, \pi) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\left[ \begin{array}{rr} 1 & -e^{i\pi} \\ e^{i0} & e^{i(\pi + 0)} \end{array}\right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \end{array} \right] =\frac{\left| 0 \right\rangle - \left| 1 \right\rangle}{\sqrt{2}}\]
[16]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.u2(0, math.pi, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'0': 493, '1': 531}

2-15: Unitary rotation gate \(U_3\)¶

\[U_3(\theta, \phi, \lambda) =\left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} & -e^{i\lambda}\sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} \\ e^{i\phi}\sin{\frac{\theta}{2}} & e^{i(\lambda + \phi)}\cos{\frac{\theta}{2}} \end{array}\right]\]

ex: \(\theta=\pi,\ \ \phi=0,\ \ \lambda=\pi\)

\[ U_3(\pi, 0, \pi) \left| 0 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{2}} & -e^{i\pi}\sin{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\ e^{i0}\sin{\frac{\pi}{2}} & e^{i(\pi + 0)}\cos{\frac{\pi}{2}} \end{array}\right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left| 1 \right\rangle\]
\[ U_3(\pi, 0, \pi) \left| 1 \right\rangle = \left[ \begin{array}{rr} \cos{\frac{\pi}{2}} & -e^{i\pi}\sin{\frac{\pi}{2}} \\ e^{i0}\sin{\frac{\pi}{2}} & e^{i(\pi + 0)}\cos{\frac{\pi}{2}} \end{array}\right] \left[ \begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \end{array} \right] =\left[ \begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right] =\left| 0 \right\rangle\]
[17]:

q = QuantumRegister(1)
c = ClassicalRegister(1)
qc = QuantumCircuit(q, c)

qc.u3(math.pi, 0, math.pi, q[0])
qc.measure()

r = execute(qc)
print(r)
plot_histogram(r)

{'1': 1024}
